publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1510# Rhoda Grant: Crofting in the Highlands and Islands—That the Parliament recognises the contribution made by crofting to many communities throughout the Highlands and Islands by retaining people to live and work in these areas and helping to sustain a unique environment and biodiversity and urges the Scottish Executive to seek ways of supporting crofting areas to ensure that these communities grow and thrive. Supported by: Maureen Macmillan*
S1M-1510# Crofting in the Highlands and Islands (lodged on 9 January 2001) Mrs Mary Mulligan*
S1M-1510# Crofting in the Highlands and Islands (lodged on 9 January 2001) Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-1510# Rhoda Grant: Crofting in the Highlands and Islands—That the Parliament recognises the contribution made by crofting to many communities throughout the Highlands and Islands by retaining people to live and work in these areas and helping to sustain a unique environment and biodiversity and urges the Scottish Executive to seek ways of supporting crofting areas to ensure that these communities grow and thrive. Supported by: Maureen Macmillan, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Tommy Sheridan
S1M-1510# Crofting in the Highlands and Islands (lodged on 9 January 2001) Dr Elaine Murray*
S1M-1510# Crofting in the Highlands and Islands (lodged on 9 January 2001) Cathy Jamieson*, Tricia Marwick*
S1M-1510# Crofting in the Highlands and Islands (lodged on 9 January 2001) Michael Russell*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Cathy Peattie*, Scott Barrie*

Supported by: Maureen Macmillan, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Tommy Sheridan, Dr Elaine Murray, Cathy Jamieson, Tricia Marwick, Michael Russell, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Cathy Peattie, Scott Barrie
S1M-1510# Crofting in the Highlands and Islands (lodged on 9 January 2001) Mr John Munro*

Supported by: Maureen Macmillan, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Tommy Sheridan, Dr Elaine Murray, Cathy Jamieson, Tricia Marwick, Michael Russell, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Cathy Peattie, Scott Barrie, Mr John Munro, Donald Gorrie, Mr Jamie Stone
